titleStmt.title: The Harmony of ovr oathes shewing an agreement betwixt the oathes of supremacie, allegeance, the freemans oath, protestation and covenant : all publisht at large for the satisfaction of those who having not seen or not remembring the particulars therein contained beleeve and entertaine needlesse scruples concerning the same.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Pain and M. Simonds for Thomas Vnderhill,

notesStmt.note: The covenant is the "Vow and covenant appointed by the Lords and Commons ... to be taken ... throughout the whole kingdom. June 1643."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
